blogPost.excerpt: Think of Enlightn as your performance and security consultant. 120 automated checks that “review” your code, server configurations and more to provide actionable recommendations on improving your Laravel app’s performance and security.
blogPost.body: Think of Enlightn as your performance and security consultant. 120 automated checks that “review” your code, server configurations and more to provide actionable recommendations on improving your Laravel app’s performance and security.
blogPost.title: Enlightn for Laravel - Personalized recommendations for improving your Laravel code
blogPost.author: Miguel Piedrafita

localize.description: 将Enlightn视为您的性能和安全顾问。120项自动检查可以 "审查 "你的代码, 服务器配置和更多, 以提供可操作的建议来提高你的Laravel应用程序的性能和安全性.
localize.tagline: 个性化的建议来改善你的Laravel代码

localize.description: 將Enlightn視爲您的性能和安全顧問。120項自動檢查可以 "審查 "你的代碼, 服務器配置和更多, 以提供可操作的建議來提高你的Laravel應用程序的性能和安全性.
localize.tagline: 個性化的建議來改善你的Laravel代碼

previous.excerpt: Get the incredibly detailed and most accurate macOS UI Kit for Sketch. The library is loaded with hundreds of components, colors, and text styles. Arguably the fastest way to get started with your Mac app designs.
previous.title: macOS 11 Big Sur UI Kit - The most detailed and accurate macOS UI Kit for Sketch 💎

localize.description: 为Sketch获得令人难以置信的详细和最准确的macOS UI Kit。该库加载了数百种组件、颜色和文本样式。可以说是最快的方式来开始你的Mac应用设计。
localize.tagline: 最详细、最准确的macOS用户界面工具包，适用于Sketch💎。

localize.description: 爲Sketch獲得令人難以置信的詳細和最準確的macOS UI Kit。該庫加載了數百種組件、顏色和文本樣式。可以說是最快的方式來開始你的Mac應用設計。
localize.tagline: 最詳細、最準確的macOS用戶界面工具包，適用於Sketch💎。

next.excerpt: ShareDocView.com lets you share documents (PDF, Word, PowerPoint) with links to get detailed analytics on who opened which doc, when and for how long. Plus you can get email leads! ⠀ Get a FREE account and ask us in the live chat about the Product Hunt deal!
next.title: ShareDocView - Share docs with links to get analytics and email leads

localize.description: ShareDocView.com让您可以分享带有链接的文档（PDF、Word、PowerPoint），以获得关于谁打开了哪个文档、何时打开以及多长时间的详细分析。此外，您还可以获得电子邮件线索 ⠀ 获得一个免费的账户，并在即时聊天中询问我们关于产品狩猎的交易!
localize.tagline: 分享带有链接的文档，以获得分析和电子邮件线索。

localize.description: ShareDocView.com讓您可以分享帶有鏈接的文檔（PDF、Word、PowerPoint），以獲得關於誰打開了哪個文檔、何時打開以及多長時間的詳細分析。此外，您還可以獲得電子郵件線索 ⠀ 獲得一個免費的賬戶，並在即時聊天中詢問我們關於產品狩獵的交易!
localize.tagline: 分享帶有鏈接的文檔，以獲得分析和電子郵件線索。
